text: Linda Ann Gray (born September 12, 1940) is an American television and movie actress. She is mostly well known for starring on the long running program Dallas. She starred in the stage of version of Terms of Endearment. She was born in Santa Monica, California. == References == Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:1940 births Category:Living people
title: Linda Gray
